title: React Component
description: Build scalable React components with hooks
prompt:
Create a production-ready React component for [DESCRIPTION]:

Requirements:
1. Functional component with Hooks
2. TypeScript interfaces
3. State management approach
4. Styling: [CSS Modules/Styled Components/Tailwind]
5. Features: [LIST FEATURES]
6. Performance optimization
7. Accessibility (ARIA, keyboard navigation)
8. Testing with React Testing Library
9. Documentation

Provide complete TypeScript code.
example: Create a data table with sorting and pagination
